title: LoL Freezing computer after loading into game
body:
This started happening right after Windows 10 updated to the newest "anniversary edition". The Patcher and everything loads perfect. I can select a champion and load the game, but then my game crashes before the characters load into map. 

My computer completely freezes on the screen looping the last sound. I am unable to play league OR any other full screen game. CS:GO does not work. I believe that the windows update corrupted something on my computer - Graphics Card etc. but i have no clue how to fix it

These are the things I have tried to fix:
Revert to older build of Windows 10 - Failed
Repair LoL files - Failed
Delete LoL and reinstall - Failed
Update drivers - Failed - Up to Date

I will retry any suggestions, supply any logs, or try any method to fix this. 

Thank you for the help!

replies.body: This may be due to an issue with a recent Windows 10 update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  It's been causing freezing, fps, and buzzing noises for some players.  Disabling the bar should get this fixed up!

Quoted from QUANTEYES

> [{quoted}](name=QUANTEYES,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9I3Ps4Xf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-28T15:32:43.004+0000)
>
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NAXe6XfY-i-may-have-figured-out-the-crashing-problem-guys
> 
> hope it works ! :)


Seems to work so far. Ill give full update when i have time to fully test
